text.data: [character][0x1]: Sendak doesn't handle alcohol very well...[end]
Nnggg......[end]

Sendak: ...[character][0x0]... I... I...
[0x2a]blah[0x2a] [0x2a]blah[0x2a] [0x2a]rant[0x2a] [0x2a]rant[0x2a][end]
Sendak: [0x2a]blah[0x2a] [0x2a]blah[0x2a] [0x2a]rant[0x2a] [0x2a]rant[0x2a][end]

Matelite: Oh, [character][0x0]. Some Mini-Devils came by earlier.
They danced around, trying to get us to let them into our group.[end]
Matelite: The knights of Kahna shall rise again![end]
Taicho: Excellent work![end]
Taicho: Even if you drink enough alcohol for a knight you cannot let it take over you![end]
Lukia: What? Was Donfan seducing a girl again?[end]
Donfan: No, 'tis not that I, Donfan, do not owe a great deal to Lukia.[end]

Mist: Not yet... I wonder if our wish can come true... We shouldn't give up...
Oh, by the way, [character][0x0]. While I was sick in bed, I kept having this strange dream every night. In it, a man named Neal or Neill or something would point at me and say, [0x24]L R RESET! L R RESET![0x22] What do you suppose it means?[end]
It's crowded in here. Make sure you don't hurt yourself with the weapons.[end]
Go shopping No business here[end1]
It's crowded in here. Make sure you don't damage the armor.[end]
It's sweltering in here... Make sure the goods don't start to stink up.[end]
Somebody's sleeping inside. Be quiet.[end]
You say you're a friend of the person sleeping here? If so, hurry and see her![end]
So you're the Resistance. The battle with the Empire must be difficult, but don't give up hope![end]
Are you a microscope salesman too?[end]
Although Godland is at peace, the outside world is in terrible shape.[end]
Are you [character][0x0]?[end]
Thank you.[end]
Welcome. If you're gonna take some Mini-Devils that live here with you, I'll let the Resistance have stuff for free![end]

You're a member of the Resistance, right?
Calling yourself the Resistance... I really like that... Hee hee.[end]

Mini-Devils live in this town. Even though they're small, they're deadly.
If you can, I'd like it if you took them with you.[end]
You got some Stealth Armor.[end]
You got 7 Poem Diaries.[end]
You got a Holy Grass.[end]
You got an Assault.[end]
You got a Master Rod.[end]
You got a Bitter Memory.[end]
You got an Elixir.[end]

Donfan: There is something even hotter than raging flames.
There is something even hotter than the sun in the sky.[end]
Do you know what it is?[end]
Wha...?! Who ARE you?![end]
Donfan: 'Tis the burning passion I have for you![end]
Uh... yeah...[end]

Donfan: Such is the way of the world...
Donfan's burning heart.[end]
Oh, how lonely I am![end]
Do not pretend to be shy...[end]
I can see the inside of your heart as if I were looking through a microscope.[end]
Oh man... is this guy trying to sell me microscopes...?[end]
Donfan: Such is the way of the world...[end]
Lukia: Donfan!! ...What are you doing?[end]
Mist: [character][0x0]...?[end]

Donfan: Huh?!
Oh! Forgive me, Lukia![end]
It looks like this person has drifted here from Kahna.[end]
She's always talking about [character][0x0].[end]
Is that you, [character][0x0]?![end]
It's me... Mist, former member of the knights of Kahna![end]
You're awake?[end]

Donfan: If I had known there was a girl sick in bed...
Huh...?![end]
Matelite: Mist!! You're alive!![end]

Mist: Captain Matelite...!
Yes... Ever since that day, when Kahna fell...[end]

Matelite: Oh! I thought you had already been done in.
How did you manage to escape from Kahna?[end]
Hold on! She's ill, please don't yell at her!![end]
Matelite: Oh, sorry...[end]
Mist: No... I'm okay... I feel better now after seeing you and [character][0x0], Captain.[end]
Matelite: Oh, that's good! Are you being shy, [character][0x0]?[end]
Mist: That time... When I was unconscious...[end]
I was saved by a lone man...[end]
Matelite: What?! Who?![end]
Mist: ......[end]
Matelite: Mist! Who rescued you?![end]

Mist: The famous Granbelos commander...
Satha Palpaleos...[end]

Matelite: !?
...Palpaleos?!![end]
Donfan: Why would an Imperial general save a knight of Kahna?![end]
Mist: I don't completely understand myself...[end]
Lukia: [character][0x0]! Come to Melodia's house![end]
Wagahai: We're going to ride on a ship! A ship that carries death! And that name too...[end]
Melodia: This is my grandpa![end]
Grandfather: Oh! So you are [character][0x0]. I have just now heard all about you from Melodia.[end]
In such a short time away she has become such a fine, young girl. I could not be any happier.[end]
Melodia: You didn't need to say that. You're embarrassing me...[end]
Grandfather: No, no... It's not that you will not to say it but rather that you cannot say it.[end]
Melodia: Huh? I don't understand what you just said.[end]
Grandfather: Oh ho ho... It is an old adage said here in Godland.[end]
Honey, welcome back. You worked late again, I see.[end]
I'm home. Things were a little busy.[end]
I was worried since you hadn't come home.[end]
No, please forgive me. It's not that I didn't come home, it's that I couldn't come home.[end]
That is what I meant. I wonder if that makes sense to you youngsters?[end]

Melodia: Grandpa, you're just an old man who likes weird sayings.
Everybody says you're kind of cuckoo but you just forgive them.[end]
Grandfather: Melodia has always liked animals and Mini-Devils, even when she was a small child.[end]
She heard there were many dragons and Mini-Devils in Kahna. So she often said how she wanted to go to Kahna. I ignored her, then one day she had suddenly left.[end]
Melodia[0x3b] Grandpa, you keep talking about me![end]
Even Grandpa just gets up and wanders out on a journey without saying anything sometimes.[end]
Grandfather: Yes... Leaving suddenly on a journey is the lifeblood of this family. Then when we come back we have grown.[end]
Melodia: Oh yeah! [character][0x0]![end]
Grandpa's goes on all sorts of journeys to collect lots of sayings and stories about Godland. And he says there's something you and the others should hear![end]
Grandfather: Oh, yes! I called you here to tell you a story.[end]
In Godland a very old legend is told...[end]
In this land sleeps a dragon with the form of a bird.[end]
Filled with anger, the bird-dragon must not be awakened.[end]
Sendak: A legend of a Holy Dragon...?![end]

[character][0x1]: The bird-dragon... Garuda...
He's angry... I sense a fierce anger...[end]
Sendak: Yes, as do I... I feel it somewhat as well...[end]
[character][0x1]: Do you know where Garuda is?[end]

Grandfather: Yes, he has been found. He is in the western cave.
Be careful. Monsters are plentiful there.[end]
Melodia: Okay, let's head for the cave! I'll go get the dragons![end]
Sendak: Let's go, let's oo...[end][end]
